props.title: Splendid Article With A Long Title
props.lead: The successes and failures of today’s new releases could influence the future of the industry

props.string:
Exodus is one of many timed exclusives on the Epic Games Store. Epic is leveraging exclusives to entice newcomers to install the platform on their computer and create active user profiles. Some players have cried foul, claiming they’ve been forced to buy and play a game through a service that doesn’t have the functionality they’re accustomed to.

Another chapter

Exodus is one of many timed exclusives on the Epic Games Store. Epic is leveraging exclusives to entice newcomers to install the platform on their computer and create active user profiles. Some players have cried foul, claiming they’ve been forced to buy and play a game through a service that doesn’t have the functionality they’re accustomed to.

More to the point

Other critics speculate that competition in the marketplace — Steam has never had a true rival of its scale — could lead to better prices and deals for players, along with better revenue shares for game makers. Still others fear that intense pricing competition might force game makers to cut their price tags too low, too quickly. Here's a list of stuff you might consider:

  • Helo
  • Helo
  • Oh no
  • Maye take a walk
  • Appelsinkjøtt
